summary.Title: Senior Planner, DK - Esbjerg
summary.Presentation: Are you an experienced and motivated Senior Planner with a passion for contributing to the global energy transition? Do you thrive on being a key player in project success and making an impact on

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you an experienced and motivated Senior Planner with a passion for contributing to the global energy transition? Do you thrive on being a key player in project success and making an impact on sustainable energy solutions? If so, we want to hear from you!

Your position
In your new position as Senior Planner in the Transitional Energies division, you will play a pivotal role in driving the success of key projects. As part of a dedicated team focused on shaping the energy transition, your work will directly contribute to creating a sustainable future. You will also serve as an active sparring partner for project managers, ensuring alignment and execution excellence.

At Semco Maritime, safety is a core value, and in this role, you will contribute to maintaining and promoting a strong safety culture while delivering innovative solutions.

Your place of work will be at our Global HQ located in Esbjerg, the hub of the Danish energy industry, right on the waterfront – where the views don’t get any better. The position is full-time, and you can expect to travel approximately 10-15 days per year.

“Semco Maritime is delivering exiting projects across conventional and new energy areas. Especially within the emerging technologies for Carbon Capture and PtX we are fulfilling an important role as EPC integrator, assisting new technology partners delivering successful projects to the established energy industry. Strong planning competence are at the very heart of this success." – [Henrik Løbner Rosenberg], [Senior Director, Engineering & Projects].

Your tasks & responsibilities
As a Senior Planner, you will take on significant responsibility in project scheduling and resource management, working closely with project managers and stakeholders.

Your tasks will include, but are not limited to:

  • Building comprehensive project schedules, including milestones and timelines, using critical path methodology.
  • Ensuring clear responsibility and ownership of project outcomes via Work Breakdown Structure (WBS).
  • Ensuring schedules align with project execution plans and control strategies, with periodic updates.
  • Facilitating schedule discussions with project teams, clients, and subcontractors.
  • Challenging and suggesting alternative execution sequences to optimize project timelines.
  • Supporting resource forecasting and ensuring allocation aligns with project changes.


Your profile & qualifications
We are looking for a proactive and organized Senior Planner who is passionate about project planning and execution within the energy industry. You have a structured and detail-oriented approach to your work and are eager to contribute to innovative solutions in the energy transition.

To succeed in this position, we imagine that you have:

  • Work experience in project planning and time management.
  • A technical education relevant to the energy industry.
  • Extensive experience with project planning tools such as Primavera or equivalent.
  • A solid understanding of project management processes.
  • Fluency in oral and written English.


Welcome to Semco Maritime
At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,500 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we focus on how to make it happen – by providing practical, innovative solutions. This is what we do, and we invite you to be part of it.

Safety is at the core of everything we do, and we are committed to protecting our people, partners, and the planet as we work towards a sustainable energy future.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?
Change. With us.

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Henrik Løbner Rosenberg at +45 7916 6578.

APPLY:
https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/senior-planner/k0wvdi/en

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company with 2,400 employees and 40 years of dedication rooted in both the conventional energy sector and the offshore wind industry. This puts us in a unique position to bridge today's and tomorrow’s solutions, constantly seeking clever and pragmatic ways to realise global energy ambitions. We do this through comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects together with world-leading partners across the globe.
